%% Master Thesis Template

\documentclass[pdftex,10pt,b5paper,twoside]{book}
\usepackage[lmargin=25mm,rmargin=25mm,tmargin=27mm,bmargin=30mm]{geometry}
%\usepackage{times}
\usepackage{natbib}
\usepackage{fancyvrb}
\usepackage{enumerate}
\bibliographystyle{chicago}

\input{docsetup.tex}

\begin{document}

%% PART 1
%%The title page will be automatically generated and added by the DAIM system
%\input{dedication.tex}		%% Optional

%% PART 2
\input{dedication.tex}		%% Optional
% \input{preface.tex}		%% Optional, problem description?
\input{abstract.tex}		%% Optional, abstract?
\input{list.tex}			%% Generate TOC, list of tables, and list of figures automatically
\input{abbreviations.tex}	%% Optional

%% PART 3 -- The Chapters
\input{chapter1.tex}		%% Intro - [MACRO]
\input{chapter2.tex}        %% Literary review
\input{chapter3.tex}        %% Basic theory
\input{chapter4.tex}        %% Technology
\input{chapter5.tex}        %% Discussion - [MACRO]; Summary & conclusion. RQs. Discussion. Future work.
% \input{chapter6.tex}        %% Conclusion and future work
%\input{introductionsamplecopy.tex}

%% PART 4
\input{references.tex}	%% Edit your references in "mylib.bib"
\input{appendixA.tex}		%% Optional
\input{appendixB.tex}		%% Optional
\input{appendixC.tex}		%% Optional
\input{appendixD.tex}		%% Optional
\input{appendixE.tex}		%% Optional

\end{document}
